title: World of Warcraft v2 4 2 [RWoW] (newest)
description:
World of Warcraft v2.4.2 [RWoW]

1. Extract the archives.
2. Go to http://raidenwow.com/modules.php?name=Account_Creation and create an account.
3. Open WoW.exe and play with that account. Please wait 3 minutes after account creation for account to validate.


The client youre downloading is version 2.4.2. The RWoW realmlist is subject to change so please check the homepage at raidenwow.com
To change your realmlist (If you dont know how,) open the (realmlist.wtf) file and make it say:

(set realmlist newrealmlist) without parentheses.
